Maths.title: Algebra Basics
Maths.content: Algebra involves solving equations with unknowns. Key concepts include variables, constants, coefficients, and operations.

Maths.title: Geometry Intro
Maths.content: Study of shapes, angles, and dimensions. Important topics include points, lines, planes, and various geometric figures.

Maths.title: Calculus Fundamentals
Maths.content: Calculus is the study of change. It includes concepts such as limits, derivatives, and integrals.

Current Affairs.title: Election 2025
Current Affairs.content: Important updates and political analysis for 2025. Key candidates and their platforms will be discussed.

Current Affairs.title: Climate Change Initiatives
Current Affairs.content: Overview of global efforts to combat climate change, including policies and grassroots movements.

English.title: Verb Forms
English.content: Main verb tenses: present, past, and future. Understanding how to use them correctly is crucial for effective communication.

English.title: Literary Devices
English.content: Common literary devices include metaphor, simile, alliteration, and personification, which enhance writing.

Computer.title: Introduction to Hardware
Computer.content: Hardware includes the physical parts of a computer. Key components include the CPU, RAM, and storage devices.

Computer.title: Software Basics
Computer.content: Software is a set of instructions that tells the hardware what to do. It can be system software or application software.

Tips & Tricks.title: Memory Hacks
Tips & Tricks.content: Use spaced repetition and visual association to enhance memory retention. Techniques like mind mapping can also be helpful.

Tips & Tricks.title: Effective Study Techniques
Tips & Tricks.content: Active recall, summarization, and self-testing are proven methods to improve learning outcomes.
